data.description: A POD document widget for Gtk2-Perl
data.similar:
There is a Tk POD widget called Tk::POD. However it's not so useful
    for Gtk2-Perl applications :)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Gtk::PodViewer is a custom widget based on Gtk2::TextView so I
    think the choice of namespace is reasonable. I've been working with
    the developers of Gtk2-Perl who are quite happy with it.

    The distribution includes a POD browser application that's quite
    useable although it's really an example. The idea behind the widget
    is that it can be used to display help documentation in a Perlish
    way.
